data.author: Jack Dawson
data.quote: I love waking up in the morning not knowing what's gonna happen or, who I'm gonna meet, where I'm gonna wind up.

data.author: Qui-Gon Jinn
data.quote: Your focus determines your reality.

data.author: Charlotte A. Cavatica
data.quote: You have been my friend. That in itself is a tremendous thing.

data.author: The Once-ler
data.quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It’s not.

data.author: Zidane Tribal
data.quote: You don't need a reason to help people.

data.author: The Hero's Spirit of the Legend of Zelda
data.quote: A sword wields no strength unless the hand that holds it has courage.

data.author: Iroh of the Fire Nation
data.quote: Pride is not the opposite of shame, but it’s source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.

data.author: Alan Wake
data.quote: If our lives are already written, it would take a courageous man to change the script.

data.author: Mark Watney
data.quote: At some point, everything's gonna go south on you and you're going to say, this is it. This is how I end. Now you can either accept that, or you can get to work. That's all it is.

data.author: Vyse
data.quote: Even if you run into a storm, there's always a way out, no matter how bleak things seem.

data.author: Mordin Solus
data.quote: Life is a negotiation. We all want. We all give to get what we want.

data.author: Oerba Dia Vanille
data.quote: Wishes can come true. But not if you just wait for miracles. Miracles are things we make for ourselves.

data.author: Winnie the Pooh
data.quote: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.

data.author: /u/c00yt825
data.quote: Nothing is foolproof for a sufficiently talented fool.

data.author: Pablo Picasso
data.quote: My mother said to me, 'If you are a soldier, you will become a general. If you are a monk, you will become the Pope.' Instead, I was a painter, and became Picasso.

data.author: Richard P. Feynman
data.quote: You have no responsibility to live up to what other people think you ought to accomplish. I have no responsibility to be like they expect me to be. It's their mistake, not my failing.

data.author: Steve Furtick
data.quote: The reason we struggle with insecurity is because we compare our behind-the-scenes with everyone else’s highlight reel.

data.author: Bertrand Russell
data.quote: The whole problem with the world is that fools and fanatics are always so certain of themselves, and wiser people so full of doubts.

data.author: Stephen McCranie
data.quote: The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.

data.author: John Steinbeck
data.quote: And now that you don't have to be perfect, you can be good
